str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Or ekchuno ek-khoo'-no from ek and cheo; to pour forth; figuratively, to bestow.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
Set apart by (or for) God, holy, sacred. From hagos; sacred.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Blood, literally, figuratively or specially; by implication, bloodshed, also kindred.
To drink, imbibe. A prolonged form of pio, which poo occurs only as an alternate in certain tenses; to imbibe.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.
Worthy, worthy of, deserving, comparable, suitable. Probably from ago; deserving, comparable or suitable.
